mapper.insert: insert into t_caseinfo values ( #{casecategory}, #{casename}, #{caseno}, to_timestamp(#{receivedtime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{handleunit}, #{handlepeson}, #{personid}, #{casetype}, #{casedescription}, #{mainperson}, #{operationperson}, to_date(#{filingtime},'yyyy-MM-dd') )
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_caseinfo where caseno=#{caseno}
